item.title: How to utilize the time post your final engineering exam
item.description: Final semester exams done and the long vacation begins…!!! (After 2 weeks or so) Friend: Hey dude, wassup these days? You: Hi! What are doing in your vacation? Any news about your joining date in XYZ company? For those of you who are really bored right now, just try copy-pasting any one of the above conversations in your favorite messaging app chat search and youâ€™ll probably be surprised with the number of results that come up.
